name: Reviews Plus
author: impleCode

sections.description:
Reviews Plus is a free WordPress plugin that allows you to manage and display your customers reviews for products, services or any other type of content. It can be activated for any WordPress page, post or custom post type.

Reviews Plus will replace the comments for selected post type. This lets you take advantage of WordPress built in functionality like reviews moderation, spam, trash with the same interface without mixing the comments and reviews.

Each post type has separate reviews admin page.

eCommerce Product Catalog compatible

If you are also looking for a product catalog, look no more and choose eCommerce Product Catalog. It is fully compatible with Reviews Plus plugin.

WooCommerce compatible

Reviews Plus will replace the default WooCommerce reviews.

Built with WordPress

Reviews Plus is build with WordPress functions to provide maximum compatibility with other plugins. It takes advantage of WordPress comment system.

Reviews Summary in SERP for organic SEO

Reviews Plus rating summary is fully compatible with Google guidance in order to show up in the results.

User Friendly Design

Reviews Plus has fully responsive design.

Display Reviews with a Shortcode

You can show the reviews automatically on every page or use a shortcode: [reviews]
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 3.5 or greater
  • PHP version 5.2.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t even need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Reviews Plus, log in to your WordPress admin panel, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Reviews Plus” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found Reviews Plus plugin you can view details about it such as the the rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking Install Now. After clicking that link you will be asked if you’re sure you want to install the plugin. Click yes and WordPress will automatically complete the installation.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our reviews plugin and uploading it to your web-server via your favourite FTP application.

  1. Download the plugin file to your computer and unzip it
  2. Using an FTP program, or your hosting control panel, upload the unzipped plugin folder to your WordPress installation’s wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin from the Plugins menu within the WordPress admin.

Upgrading

Automatic updates should work like a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.

If on the off-chance you do encounter issues with the plugin pages after an update you simply need to flush the permalinks by going to WordPress > Settings > Permalinks and hitting ‘save’. That should return things to normal.
sections.faq:
Where are the settings located?

Reviews Plus settings are located in WP Dashboard > Settings > Reviews. You can select the post types (posts, pages or any custom post type) that the reviews should be active for.

Where are the reviews located?

Reviews Plus reviews are located in a separate screen for each post type. You will find a Reviews link under each post type in the administrator menu. For Products it will be under Products > Reviews.

sections.reviews:
Great Plugin & great Support

By Brian Haas (masteradhoc) on October 31, 2023

Great Plugin that does exactly what it advertises. We had one small request (low priority) that was handeled by the Support immediately and a update was released!

Worked ok until it didn't

By Dan Nita on September 7, 2023

It was simple, functional, wonderful but broke my entire site. Last update broke the pages displaying only an awful message "Critical Error... Find out more on WordPress..."

Anyone can suggest a better plugin?

Hopefully this will be maintained

By BubbaLovesWP (BubbaLovesTV) on January 8, 2022

I'm giving this 5 stars in the hope that this plugin will be maintained and improved. It has great potential. As per my review - It's a nice neat plugin that works well. Simple. Hopes for improvement: - Option for half star ratings, or incremental stars - Display ratings in other formats, like circles, not just stars - Maybe some response in the support page would be nice! - CSS could be improved - And I did encounter a issue with approving comments, but that may be a conflict with other ratings plugins. So don't take my word on that. Anyway, I'm looking forward to more updates.... please!

Great Plugin

By Karol (somrafka) on January 7, 2022

A really good plugin is suitable for my site where I do reviews, I also try to help with the translation into my language maybe it will help

Possible to override the plugin template

By hiteshmetataggsolutions on February 25, 2021

Hello Team, I want to customize on plugin template, is it possible to override the plugin template file. Please give me response as soon as possible. Thanks!

No need to reinvent the wheel!

By kevisorus on October 9, 2020

I really like the fact that this plugin uses WordPress's native comments. This gives you the security that your comments will always be under your control no matter what. I've to say this is by far the most effective way of implementing user reviews I've come across after testing some of the more full-blown review plugins. Kudos to the developers

Plugin working

By ksjs10 on April 29, 2019

Hello, Your plugin working with latest version of WordPress. I managed to customize layout with CSS, and everything is fine. I hope you will continue to improve the plugin. For example, sort comments by popularity. :)

Waste of Time

By Sergei (yegorov1976@ya.ru) on December 29, 2018

At first glance I thought it's what I need: great and simple design, works with posts and pages. But the reviews pending for approval are not showing in comment. Support forum is dead.

Exactly what i need

By Reza Ramezanpour (rezairdev) on November 11, 2017

Selected in about 5 review plug-ins. simple, lightweight and customizable.

Awesome Plugin

By kayakjosh on October 19, 2017

This plugin is a lot more simple than every other rating plugin I have tested, but it delivers where the rest fall short. Highly recommend!

short_description: Reviews Plus activates rich reviews for selected content. Turns comments into reviews and provides 100% SERP compatible reviews system.
